verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,

Make <WH6213> thee two <WH8147> trumpets <WH2689> of silver <WH3701>; of beaten work <WH4749> shalt thou make <WH6213> them <WH1961>: and thou shalt use them for the calling <WH4744> of the congregation <WH5712>, and for the journeying <WH4550> of the camps <WH4264>.
And when they shall blow <WH8628> them <WH2004>, all the congregation <WH5712> shall gather <WH3259> themselves unto thee at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>.
And if they blow <WH8628> but one <WH259>, then the princes <WH5387>, the heads <WH7218> of the thousands <WH505> of Israel <WH3478>, shall gather themselves unto thee <WH3259>.
And when ye blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643>, the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the east side <WH6924> shall take their journey <WH5265>.

And when ye blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> the second time <WH8145>, the camps <WH4264> that lie <WH2583> on the south side <WH8486> shall take their journey <WH5265>: they shall blow <WH8628> an alarm <WH8643> for their journeys <WH4550>.
But when the assembly <WH6951> is to be gathered together <WH6950>, ye shall blow <WH8628>, but ye shall not sound an alarm <WH7321>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175>, the priests <WH3548>, shall blow <WH8628> the trumpets <WH2689>; and they shall be to you for a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755>.

And when ye go <WH935> to war <WH4421> in your land <WH776> against <WH6862> the adversary that oppresseth <WH6887> you <WH7321>, then ye shall sound an alarm with the trumpets <WH2689>; and ye shall be remembered <WH2142> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and ye shall be saved <WH3467> from your enemies <WH341>.

Also in the day <WH3117> of your gladness <WH8057>, and in your set feasts <WH4150>, and in the beginnings <WH7218> of your months <WH2320>, ye shall blow <WH8628> the trumpets <WH2689> over your burnt-offerings <WH5930>, and over the sacrifices <WH2077> of your peace-offerings <WH5930>; and they shall be to you for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> your God <WH430>: I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>.

And it came to pass in the second <WH8145> year <WH8141>, in the second <WH8145> month <WH2320>, on the twentieth <WH6242> day of the month <WH6051>, that the cloud was taken up <WH5927> from over the tabernacle <WH4908> of the testimony <WH5715>.

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> set forward <WH5265> according to their journeys <WH4550> out of the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai <WH5514>; and the cloud <WH6051> abode <WH7931> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran <WH6290>.
And they first <WH7223> took their journey <WH5265> according to the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872>.

And in the first <WH7223> place the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> set <WH5265> forward according to their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host was Nahshon <WH5177> the son <WH1121> of Amminadab <WH5992>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> was Nethanel <WH5417> the son <WH1121> of Zuar <WH6686>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> was Eliab <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Helon <WH2497>.

And the tabernacle <WH4908> was taken down <WH3381>; and the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648> and the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, who bare <WH5375> the tabernacle <WH4908>, set forward <WH5265>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of Reuben <WH7205> set forward <WH5265> according to their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elizur <WH468> the son <WH1121> of Shedeur <WH7707>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> was Shelumiel <WH8017> the son <WH1121> of Zurishaddai <WH6701>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> was Eliasaph <WH460> the son <WH1121> of Deuel <WH1845>.
And the Kohathites <WH6956> set forward <WH5265>, bearing <WH5375> the sanctuary <WH4720>: and the others did set up <WH6965> the tabernacle <WH4908> against their coming <WH935>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> set forward <WH5265> according to their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Elishama <WH476> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> was Gamaliel <WH1583> the son <WH1121> of Pedahzur <WH6301>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> was Abidan <WH27> the son <WH1121> of Gideoni <WH1441>.

And the standard <WH1714> of the camp <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835>, which was the rearward <WH622> of all the camps <WH4264>, set forward <WH5265> according to their hosts <WH6635>: and over his host <WH6635> was Ahiezer <WH295> the son <WH1121> of Ammishaddai <WH5996>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> was Pagiel <WH6295> the son <WH1121> of Ochran <WH5918>.
And over the host <WH6635> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> was Ahira <WH299> the son <WH1121> of Enan <WH5881>.
Thus were <WH428> the journeyings <WH4550> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to their hosts <WH6635>; and they set forward <WH5265>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto Hobab <WH2246>, the son <WH1121> of Reuel <WH7467> the Midianite <WH4084>, Moses <WH4872>' father-in <WH2859>-law, We are journeying <WH5265> unto the place <WH4725> of which Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559>, I will give <WH5414> it you <WH3212>: come thou with us <WH2895>, and we will do thee good; for Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> good <WH2895> concerning Israel <WH3478>.
And he said <WH559> unto him <WH3212>, I will not go; but I will depart <WH3212> to mine own land <WH776>, and to my kindred <WH4138>.
And he said <WH559>, Leave <WH5800> us not <WH3651>, I pray thee; forasmuch as thou knowest how we are to encamp <WH2583> in the wilderness <WH4057>, and thou shalt be to us instead of eyes <WH5869>.
And it shall be <WH3212>, if thou go with us <WH2896>, yea, it shall be, that what good soever Jehovah <WH3068> shall do <WH3190> unto us <WH2895>, the same will we do unto thee.

And they set forward <WH5265> from the mount <WH2022> of Jehovah <WH3068> three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870>; and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> went <WH5265> before <WH6440> them three <WH7969> days <WH3117>' journey <WH1870>, to seek out <WH8446> a resting-place <WH4496> for them.
And the cloud <WH6051> of Jehovah <WH3068> was over them by day <WH3119>, when they set forward <WH5265> from the camp <WH4264>.

And it came to pass <WH727>, when the ark set forward <WH5265>, that Moses <WH4872> said <WH559>, Rise up <WH6965>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, and let thine enemies <WH341> be scattered <WH6327>; and let them that hate <WH8130> thee flee <WH5127> before thee <WH6440>.
And when it rested <WH5117>, he said <WH559>, Return <WH7725>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, unto the ten <WH7233> thousands <WH505> of the thousands of Israel <WH3478>.
